ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SAP assigned to the service. Values-The following values apply to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS:.

The name of the scheduler. Values-Valid names consist of any string up to 32 characters, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
Display only the policy displayed on the ingress SAP.
Display only the policy displayed on the egress SAP.
